DOC.brief_summary: Assessment of optic disc morphology can be difficult in patients with uveitis and papilloedema. Therefore different optical coherence tomography (OCT) and laser scanning techniques may help to detect damage to the retinal nerve fibre layer.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Retinal Nerve Fibre Layer by Optical Coherence Tomography in Uveitis Patients With Papilloedema
DOC.criteria: anterior or intermediate uveitis papilloedema glaucoma dense cataract dense vitreous opacification circular posterior synechiae
